404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

1.title: Context Engineering Infrastructure
1.description: Comprehensive context management beyond prompt engineering - the right information, at the right time, in the right format.

2.title: 14+ Service Integrations
2.description: Production-ready integrations with GitHub, Slack, Airtable, HubSpot, Notion, Figma, Spotify, Stripe, and more.

3.title: Enhanced MCP Support
3.description: Production-grade Model Context Protocol implementation with built-in OAuth flows and persistent credential management.

4.title: Enterprise Security
4.description: HashiCorp Vault integration, automatic token rotation, encrypted credential storage, and OAuth UI flows.

5.title: RESTful API
5.description: Clean HTTP endpoints with comprehensive documentation at api.context.space that actually work reliably in production.

6.title: Open Source Community
6.description: AGPL v3 license transitioning to Apache 2.0, with active Discord community and welcoming contribution process.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to streamline your workflow and boost productivity with enterprise-grade security and performance

cta.text: Want to see more? Check out our roadmap or

roadmap.title: Context Engineering Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey from production-ready integrations to full context engineering infrastructure built on MCP principles.

items.oauthFlows: Built-in OAuth flows and credential management
items.enterpriseSecurity: HashiCorp Vault integration and enterprise security
items.contextMemory: Persistent context memory and state management
